item.description: Hello, my name is Justin Waltrip. I am currently studying computer science and applied mathematics at Johns Hopkins University in Baltimore, Maryland. I also work as a Data Scientist for an artificial intelligence company called Cognistx based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. I am interested in natural language processing, including question answering using knowledge graphs and large language models, and geometric machine learning, specifically using graph neural networks. Outside of data science, I also have experience with software engineering and full-stack web development.
